markdown:
**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 343 4.0 **Traditions** [Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3) **Bloodline** [Fey](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=7) **Deities** [Bes](/Deities.aspx?ID=633), [Chaldira](/Deities.aspx?ID=336), [Cong](/Deities.aspx?ID=502), [Kofusachi](/Deities.aspx?ID=309), [The Lantern King](/Deities.aspx?ID=455), [The Perplexing Jest](/Deities.aspx?ID=271) **Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284) **Range** 30 feet **Target** 1 living creature **Saving Throw** Will **Duration** sustained --- The target is overtaken with uncontrollable laughter. It must attempt a Will save. **Critical Success** The target is unaffected.
**Success** The target is plagued with uncontrollable laugher. It can't use reactions.
**Failure** The target is slowed 1 and can't use reactions.
**Critical Failure** The target falls prone and can't use actions or reactions for 1 round. It then suffers the failure effects.
name: Hideous Laughter

</row>

**Range** 30 feet

 

**Target** 1 living creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** 
Will

**Duration** sustained
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Fits of laughter make a creature unable to take all its actions.
</summary>
summary: Fits of laughter make a creature unable to take all its actions.
summary_markdown: Fits of laughter make a creature unable to take all its actions.
text: Hideous Laughter Two Actions Source Core Rulebook pg. 343 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Occult Bloodline Fey Deities Bes, Chaldira, Cong, Kofusachi, The Lantern King, The Perplexing Jest Cast somatic, verbal Range 30 feet Target 1 living creature Saving Throw Will Duration sustained --- The target is overtaken with uncontrollable laughter. It must attempt a Will save. Critical Success The target is unaffected. Success The target is plagued with uncontrollable laugher. It can't use reactions. Failure The target is slowed 1 and can't use reactions. Critical Failure The target falls prone and can't use actions or reactions for 1 round. It then suffers the failure effects.
